#### *The Palouse Fire Department and Palouse Emergency Services both have openings for volunteers. Please apply at Palouse City Hall.*

[Palouse Fire Department on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/palousefd/)

### Palouse City Hall

East 120 Main Street
P.O Box 248
Palouse, WA 99161

**City Hall Hours:**
Monday through Friday,
9:00 am to 4:00 pm
